K12D0502_H0470:360b-14: bdag po med cing yongs su bzung ba med pa /
K12D0502_H0470:360b-15: ma lus pa de dag dang /
K12D0502_H0470:360b-16: sems can gyi khams na yod pa de dag dus thams cad du sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0502_H0470:360b-17: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:360b-18: yongs su bsngos nas bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang /
K12D0502_H0470:360b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis /
K12D0502_H0470:360b-20: mchod pa'i sprin rab 'byams mchog tu rgya che ba /
K12D0502_H0470:360b-21: chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa rnams de bzhin
K12D0502_H0470:360b-22: gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
K12D0502_H0470:360b-23: du rab tu 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod la
K12D0502_H0470:360b-24: / de lta bu'i mchod pa'i sprin 'byung bar byed
K12D0502_H0470:360b-25: pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di yang brjod pa bya
K12D0502_H0470:360b-26: / ste / na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi sa tv'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:360b-27: sarba ta th'a ga te aa dhishthi te /
K12D0502_H0470:360b-28: ga ga na kha bho spha ra sa mante na sv'ah'a /
K12D0502_H0470:361a-1: lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:361a-2: lhag ma yang ji ltar tsam 'dod pa brjod par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:361a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mchod pa ji
K12D0502_H0470:361a-5: lta ba bzhin du yang dag par gnas par 'gyur
K12D0502_H0470:361a-6: zhing byin gyis rlob la mkhyen par yang 'gyur ro
K12D0502_H0470:361a-7: // de nas bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs kyi sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0502_H0470:361a-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan bsngags
K12D0502_H0470:361a-9: pa'i rgya mtsho glu dbyangs mchog rgya che ba rab
K12D0502_H0470:361a-10: 'byams rnams de bzhin gshegs par thams cad kyi byin
K12D0502_H0470:361a-11: gyi rlabs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod la
K12D0502_H0470:361a-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:361a-14: chos sgrogs pa'i dbyangs 'byung bar byed pa'i rig pa'i
K12D0502_H0470:361a-15: rig pa'i rgyal mo lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod
K12D0502_H0470:361a-16: par bya'o // na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi sa tv'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:361a-17: sarba tra sam ku su mi ta aa bhi dzny'a ta r'a shi ni /
K12D0502_H0470:361a-19: de ltar don yod pa 'di la mngon par dad
K12D0502_H0470:361a-20: par byas nas bsgrubs na de bzhin du 'dir 'byung
K12D0502_H0470:361a-21: bar 'gyur ro // de nas bla na med pa'i bsod nams dang /
K12D0502_H0470:361a-22: ye shes kyi tshogs de dag thams cad yang dag
K12D0502_H0470:361a-23: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bya'o; ;de
K12D0502_H0470:361a-24: nas tshad med pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yang rung
K12D0502_H0470:361a-25: ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed la sngags bzlas
K12D0502_H0470:361b-0: shing / de ltar re zhig bdag gis sems bskyed pa dang pos @361b bdag gi smon lam dang /
K12D0502_H0470:361b-2: ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'dir sems can gyi khams thams cad sems bskyed pa grub par gyur cig /
K12D0502_H0470:361b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyang 'byung bar gyur cig ces bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:361b-4: yang na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa grub par gyur cig /
K12D0502_H0470:361b-5: 'byung bar gyur cig ces brjod do //
K12D0502_H0470:361b-6: yang na bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs
K12D0502_H0470:361b-7: rgya mtsho sems can thams cad la 'byung bar gyur
K12D0502_H0470:361b-9: yang na dngos grub gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K12D0502_H0470:361b-10: rnams kyis mkhyen pa de bdag gi bsod nams dang;
K12D0502_H0470:361b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
K12D0502_H0470:361b-13: sems can thams cad kyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur
K12D0502_H0470:361b-15: sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:361b-16: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:361b-17: na mo stu ste mah'a badzra sarba st'a hi tam
K12D0502_H0470:361b-18: ka ra tishtha sarba tra sarba sha ta dharma n'am
K12D0502_H0470:361b-19: dhishtha ya sv'ah'a / de'i rjes la 'dir sems can
K12D0502_H0470:361b-20: gyi khams rnams la ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du
K12D0502_H0470:361b-21: sems can rnams la phan pa'i rnam pa thams cad
K12D0502_H0470:361b-24: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs shing phyag byas la /
K12D0502_H0470:361b-26: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par
K12D0502_H0470:361b-27: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams
K12D0502_H0470:361b-28: cad la rjes su yi rang bar dmigs nas ji
K12D0502_H0470:362a-0: srid skyo @362a *// bar ma gyur gyi bar du bzla bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:362a-1: de nas glegs bam bklags la zas la spyad cing
K12D0502_H0470:362a-2: zas kyis dub na bstis nas snga dro'i cho ga
K12D0502_H0470:362a-3: de nyid kyis phyi dro yang bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:362a-4: nyal ba na dang po yan lag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0502_H0470:362a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas khri ma yin pa la nyal bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:362a-6: cho ga 'di nyid kyis nus pa ji lta ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:362a-7: stobs ji lta ba bzhin nyin re zhing yar ngo'i nya'i zla ba gcig gi bar du bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:362a-8: de nas thabs dang mi ldan pa'i cho ga yang
K12D0502_H0470:362a-9: ji skad gsungs pa bzhin nus pa ji lta ba
K12D0502_H0470:362a-11: dag gis nus pa ma yin no /
K12D0502_H0470:362a-12: zhes sgyid lug par mi bya ste /
K12D0502_H0470:362a-13: las ji lta ba 'bras bu yang de lta bu'i
K12D0502_H0470:362a-14: zhes bya bas dngos grub kyi 'bras bu 'grub par
K12D0502_H0470:362a-15: 'gyur ro // zhes bsams la ri la sogs pa'i gnas rab tu dben pa'am /
K12D0502_H0470:362a-16: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i khang pa stong pa'am /
K12D0502_H0470:362a-17: bla gab med par 'du 'dzin rnam par spangs la
K12D0502_H0470:362a-18: sems can la gnod pa med pas cho ga 'di
K12D0502_H0470:362a-19: bzhin du bya'o; ;khrus la sogs pa med kyang rung
K12D0502_H0470:362a-21: chul khrims 'tshal pa yin yang rung /
K12D0502_H0470:362a-23: bsod nams dang mi ldan yang rung ste /
K12D0502_H0470:362a-24: gang yang mang du sgrub pa la goms par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:362a-25: mun pa chen po nas snang bar 'jug par 'dod pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:362a-26: 'khor par ltung ba rnams byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la bskyon par 'dod pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:362b-0: gang yang @362b mang du 'bad bas log par ltung
K12D0502_H0470:362b-1: ba rnams rab tu gzung zhing snang bar byed pa
K12D0502_H0470:362b-2: rab tu thob par 'dod pas cho ga bzhin nyin
K12D0502_H0470:362b-3: re zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du byas la
K12D0502_H0470:362b-4: / mthar yar ngo'i bco lnga la ji ltar mngon
K12D0502_H0470:362b-5: par 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mchod rten dang
K12D0502_H0470:362b-8: dam pa'i chos glegs bam mam /
K12D0502_H0470:362b-9: gang yang rung ba'i mdun du me tog sil mas bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la /
K12D0502_H0470:362b-10: lo ma bting ba la 'dug ste /
K12D0502_H0470:362b-11: bsrung ba'i cho ga la sogs pa snga ma bzhin
K12D0502_H0470:362b-12: bsams la lan gsum gyi bar du sngags brjod par
K12D0502_H0470:362b-13: bya'o // de nas lcags kyi 'khor lo 'am; rdo rje'am /
K12D0502_H0470:362b-17: chu gri zla phyed kyi bar du ba lang gi lci ba'i nang du bcug nas bton la /
K12D0502_H0470:362b-18: lag tu bzung nas srod dang po nas brtsams nas mtshan rangs par sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0502_H0470:362b-19: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:362b-20: yang na rdo rje las byas ba ra'i 'o ma'i nang du bcug pas so //
K12D0502_H0470:362b-23: gser las byas pa zla ba phyed du chu'i nang du bcug pa'am /
K12D0502_H0470:362b-24: mig sman pa'i 'o ma'i bum par gcug pa'am /
K12D0502_H0470:362b-29: rang bzhin gyis gnas pa lo ma'am /
K12D0502_H0470:362b-30: gos kyi bar du lag tu bzung la bsgrub bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:362b-33: yang na lhung bzed bkrus pa'am /
K12D0502_H0470:362b-37: ri mo lag tu bzung bas sam /
K12D0502_H0470:363a-1: las byas pa'i ral gri la sogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa 'grub pa'i rdzas rnams dang /
K12D0502_H0470:363a-2: mtshan rang sa par bsgrubs na nam phyed dam /
K12D0502_H0470:363a-3: nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'bar bar gyur nas gal
K12D0502_H0470:363a-4: te grub na ngo mtshar chen po glo bur du
K12D0502_H0470:363a-6: nam mkha' la me tog gi char 'bab pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:363a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu g-yo ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:363a-8: snang ba chen po glo bur du 'byung ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:363a-10: ngo mtshar chen po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
K12D0502_H0470:363a-11: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs thams cad nye bar 'dus
K12D0502_H0470:363a-12: nas de la bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du
K12D0502_H0470:363a-13: sngags kyi mthu khyad par can gyis dbang bskur bar
K12D0502_H0470:363a-14: byed / yongs su 'dzin par byed do //
K12D0502_H0470:363a-15: de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig 'dzin gyi sde dpon tshogs na spyod par 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:363a-16: 'di rang gi skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0502_H0470:363a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i rig 'dzin gyi sde pa'i rgyal
K12D0502_H0470:363a-18: po nyid sdug bsngal med par 'thob par 'gyur zhing
K12D0502_H0470:363a-19: / de nyid du sa la bzhugs nas rdo rje
K12D0502_H0470:363a-20: 'dzin gyi gtso bo chen po zhes bya ba'i 'khor
K12D0502_H0470:363a-21: los bsgyur ba rab 'byams mtha' yas pa'i 'phags pa'i
K12D0502_H0470:363a-22: chos kyi spyod yul 'phrog pa med par song ba
K12D0502_H0470:363a-23: / / rnam par rol pa mtha' yas pas mdzes pa /
K12D0502_H0470:363b-0: de bzhin gshegs @363b pa'i rig pa 'dzin par byung
K12D0502_H0470:363b-1: nas nyams par mi 'gyur ba thob pas sreg pa'i
K12D0502_H0470:363b-2: bskal pa'i dus su yang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
K12D0502_H0470:363b-3: du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing bla na med pa'i bde
K12D0502_H0470:363b-4: ba'i bdud rtsi las kyang mi nyams la /
K12D0502_H0470:363b-5: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga longs spyod pa las mi
K12D0502_H0470:363b-6: nyams shing bud med mang po'i tshogs kyis yongs su
K12D0502_H0470:363b-9: thabs so so 'thob cing stobs chen po dang ldan
K12D0502_H0470:363b-10: par 'gyur zhing sems can la gnod par yang mi
K12D0502_H0470:363b-11: byed do // 'jig rten gyi rig 'dzin gyi rgyal
K12D0502_H0470:363b-12: po rnams kyang de'i bde ba'i bdud rtsi'i longs spyod
K12D0502_H0470:363b-13: mang po la ltos na zad pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:363b-14: dman pa lta bu yin pas 'jig rten pa'i rig
K12D0502_H0470:363b-15: 'dzin de dag gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing snying rje
K12D0502_H0470:363b-17: 'di'i shugs kyis 'gro ba la ltos na /
K12D0502_H0470:363b-18: lha'i 'jig rten pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyang rkang gis 'gro ba lta bur sems so //
K12D0502_H0470:363b-19: gang 'jig rten pa'i rigs 'dzin grub pa de dang /
K12D0502_H0470:363b-21: ri rab kyi khyad par lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:363b-22: 'di lta bu'i thabs dang ldan pa'i cho ga'o //
K12D0502_H0470:363b-23: thabs dang mi ldan pas ni ji ltar mos pa
K12D0502_H0470:363b-24: bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i cho ga
K12D0502_H0470:363b-25: zhib mo rim par phye ba rab 'byams kyi cho
K12D0502_H0470:364a-0: ga'o // sngar gyi rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad kyis bsgrub par bya zhing sngar @364a *//
K12D0502_H0470:364a-1: gyi rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad kyis sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:364a-2: mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrub pa'i thabs ni rnam pa gnyis te /
K12D0502_H0470:364a-3: rab tu dben par sangs rgyas dang; byang chub sems
K12D0502_H0470:364a-4: dpa' la sogs pas dmigs pa rtag tu zlos pa
K12D0502_H0470:364a-5: dang / lha ma nyes par byed pas mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrub pa ste /
K12D0502_H0470:364a-6: cho ga'i thabs de dag gis rtag tu goms par
K12D0502_H0470:364a-7: byas nas mngon par shes pa lnga nye bar 'byung
K12D0502_H0470:364a-8: bar 'gyur ro // las rnam par gnyis kyis rdzu
K12D0502_H0470:364a-9: 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams thob par 'gyur te; lus
K12D0502_H0470:364a-10: bar 'gyur ro // yang ba dang / sems yang
K12D0502_H0470:364a-11: ba nyid la goms par byed cing zlos pa dang
K12D0502_H0470:364a-12: bar 'gyur ro // yang ba dang / / dben
K12D0502_H0470:364a-13: par 'dug nas bzlas pa la goms par byed pa'o
K12D0502_H0470:364a-14: bar 'gyur ro // yang ba dang / / // mi snang ba'i cho ga ni gsum ste /
K12D0502_H0470:364a-16: nyin mtshan gcig sbyor bas sgrub pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:364a-17: dur khrod du sa la byas pa'i mchod rten byas
K12D0502_H0470:364a-18: pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor byas pa la me tog
K12D0502_H0470:364a-19: sil mas bkram pa la 'dug nas ba bla'am /
K12D0502_H0470:364a-22: byang chub kyi shing gzhan yang rung /
K12D0502_H0470:364a-23: mya ngan med pa la sogs pa bkra shis kyi
K12D0502_H0470:364a-24: shing gi lo ma bzhag nas sgrub pa pos tho
K12D0502_H0470:364a-25: rangs kyi dus nas srod kyi bar du nyin rangs
K12D0502_H0470:364b-0: bsgrub par bya'o // de las du byung na mi snang bar @364b 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:364b-1: gal te nyi ma de la ma grub na nyi ma gsum gyi bar du bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:364b-2: de lta na yang ma grub na nyi ma bzhi
K12D0502_H0470:364b-3: pa la nyi ma rangs par dur khrod du 'chag
K12D0502_H0470:364b-4: cing sgrub pa byas na nges par 'grub par 'gyur
K12D0502_H0470:364b-5: te / mi snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod pa'i gzugs
K12D0502_H0470:364b-6: can du 'gyur la ri rab kyi ngos kyi bar
K12D0502_H0470:364b-8: yang na de nyid du mchod rten gyi mdun du
K12D0502_H0470:364b-9: tshes bcu gsum gyi nyi ma nub nas nyi ma
K12D0502_H0470:364b-10: shar gyi bar du mchod pa byas na shing lo
K12D0502_H0470:364b-12: gi wang lo ma'i bar du bzhag nas nyi ma nub pa'i dus nas brtsams te /
K12D0502_H0470:364b-13: mtshan rangs pa bzlas nas du ba byung bas tshud gsum byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:364b-14: yang na dur khrod de nyid du khrag gis thig
K12D0502_H0470:364b-15: ler byas nas lag tu ral gri thogs nas 'dug
K12D0502_H0470:364b-16: la mtshan rangs pa bzlas pa byas na nyi ma
K12D0502_H0470:364b-17: shar ba'i dus su mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:364b-18: ro la rkang pas mnan nas lag par ral gri
K12D0502_H0470:364b-19: thogs te ji srid mi snang bar 'gyur gyi bar
K12D0502_H0470:364b-21: lag tu ral gri bzung nas nyi ma gang yang
K12D0502_H0470:364b-22: rung ba la ro bsregs pa'i thal ba la khrag
K12D0502_H0470:364b-23: gis bsangs ba'i yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg mtshan rangs
K12D0502_H0470:364b-24: pa byas na tho rangs mi snang bar 'gyur ro
K12D0502_H0470:364b-26: rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga gang yang rung

K12D0502_H0470:365a-1: *// ro; ;yang na nyi ma rangs pa ri la sogs pa'am /
K12D0502_H0470:365a-7: dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su me tog sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas pa la /
K12D0502_H0470:365a-11: rta dang; glang po che dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365a-17: khyim bya rung bris pa'i mdun du mtshan rangs pa mar dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365a-18: sbrang rtsi dang; mi'i rus pa phye ma'i sbyin sreg byas na nam phyed dam /
K12D0502_H0470:365a-20: de nas gang du 'dod pa 'gro zhing mi snang
K12D0502_H0470:365a-21: bar yang 'gyur ro; ;'dod na yang slar 'ong bar
K12D0502_H0470:365a-23: de la sbyor ba 'dis ril bu bsgrub par bya ste /
K12D0502_H0470:365a-24: aa ti pa la'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365a-26: tri barna'i rtsa ba la go da ba ri zhes bya ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365a-27: mah'a be ge'i rtsa ba la yang tree la parne zhes kyang bya ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365a-28: shing chen gyi rtsa ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365a-30: 'di dag cha mnyam par phye ma zhib mor byas
K12D0502_H0470:365a-31: nas rang gi khrag dang ril bu gsum byas nas
K12D0502_H0470:365a-33: ril bu gzhan yang mya ngan med kyi me tog dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365b-0: ma du @365b lung ga'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365b-1: ta ra ba ra rta'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365b-2: zar ma'i shun pa rnams cha mnyam pa gcig tu
K12D0502_H0470:365b-3: byas nas phye ma zhib mor byas la rang gi
K12D0502_H0470:365b-4: khrag dang ril bu sran ma tsam gsum byas te
K12D0502_H0470:365b-6: ril bu gzhan yang til gyi rtsa ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365b-7: tra pu sha'i sa bon dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365b-8: ma la ta'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365b-9: ta ma la'i lo ma rnams cha mnyam gcig tu byas pa'i phye ma zhib mo dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365b-10: rang gi khrag gis ril bu gsum byas la zangs kyis dkris bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:365b-11: ril bu gzhan yang yungs kar dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365b-14: aa ru ra'i shun pa 'di rnams cha mnyam pa'i phye ma zhib mo sbrang rtsi dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365b-15: rang gi khrag gis sbrus nas ril bu gsum byas la zangs kyis dkri bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:365b-16: ril bu gzhan yang aa ru ra dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365b-17: bi bhi kha'i 'bras bu'i rkang pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365b-20: dz'a ti'i me tog rnams cha mnyam pa'i phye ma zhib mor byas la rang gi khrag dang /
K12D0502_H0470:365b-22: ril bu gsum byas la zangs kyis btum par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:365b-23: de nas ril bu de dag sgrub pa'i thabs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:365b-24: sngags gang yang rung ba stong phrag gcig bzlas pa
K12D0502_H0470:365b-25: byas la dur khrod du dkyil 'khor byas nas dbus
K12D0502_H0470:366a-0: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam bzhag nas tshes bcu gsum gyi nyid @366a *//
K12D0502_H0470:366a-1: mtshan rangs pa lo 'dab bting ba la myur bar
K12D0502_H0470:366a-2: 'dug la lag pa g-yas par ral gri thogs nas
K12D0502_H0470:366a-3: g-yon du ril bu gang yang rung pa bzung la
K12D0502_H0470:366a-4: srod nas brtsams nas ji srid du ba byung ba
K12D0502_H0470:366a-5: dang / rab tu g-yo bar 'gyur gyi bar du
K12D0502_H0470:366a-6: bsgrub pa byas na de nas ril bu gcig khar
K12D0502_H0470:366a-7: bcug na nyi ma'i 'od lta bur 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:366a-8: khru gang tsam gyi sa la ma reg par 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:366a-9: gal te de'i nub mo ma grub na slar yang
K12D0502_H0470:366a-10: dur khrod du srod nas brtsams nas ji srid nyi
K12D0502_H0470:366a-11: ma shar gyi bar du 'chag cing bzlas pa bya'o
K12D0502_H0470:366a-12: // yang na dbang phyug chen po grub pa'i khang
K12D0502_H0470:366a-13: par mtshan ma'i steng du gzhag nas kha byang du
K12D0502_H0470:366a-14: bltas te 'dug pas lag tu ral gri thogs te
K12D0502_H0470:366a-15: // / srod dus nas brtsams nas nyi ma shar
K12D0502_H0470:366a-16: gyi bar de bzhin du khar bcug nas bsgrubs na
K12D0502_H0470:366a-18: yang na dgon pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12D0502_H0470:366a-19: yang na byang chub kyi shing bdun po gang yang
K12D0502_H0470:366a-20: rung ba'i rtsar nye bar 'dug la ril bu gang
K12D0502_H0470:366a-21: yang rung ba gsum lag tu bzung nas snga ma
K12D0502_H0470:366a-22: bzhin du bya'o // yang na dben par 'phags pa
K12D0502_H0470:366a-23: phyag na rdo rje'i phyag tu bzhag nas mchod pa
K12D0502_H0470:366a-25: yang na ji skad bstan pa'i gnas su zla ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:366a-26: nyi ma gzas zin pa'i tshe bsgrub par bya ste snga ma bzhin no //
K12D0502_H0470:366a-27: de nas mig sman 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K12D0502_H0470:366b-2: zangs phye ma rnams cha mnyam par byas la rang gi khrag dang /
K12D0502_H0470:366b-3: sbrang rtsis ril bu byas nas kham phor ma bsregs pa kha sbyar du bzhag la /
K12D0502_H0470:366b-4: dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su /
K12D0502_H0470:366b-5: de bzhin du lag tu ral gri thogs te ril bu bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:366b-6: de bzhin du ba bla byang chub kyi shing gi
K12D0502_H0470:366b-7: lo ma'i bar du bzhag nas lag tu ral gri
K12D0502_H0470:366b-8: bzung nas snga ma bzhin du bsgrub bo //
K12D0502_H0470:366b-10: byang chub kyi shing gang yang rung ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:366b-11: dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su 'phags pa rdo rje
K12D0502_H0470:366b-12: 'dzin gyi phyag tu bzhag nas tshes bcu gsum gyi
K12D0502_H0470:366b-13: nyin zhag smyung bar 'dug nas bsgrub pa'am /
K12D0502_H0470:366b-14: zla ba nyi ma gzas zin pa'i tshe srod nas brtsams nas bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:366b-15: grub na thig le byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:366b-16: gal te de'i nub mo ma grub na de bzhin
K12D0502_H0470:366b-17: du de nyid du 'chag cing nyi ma 'char ka
K12D0502_H0470:366b-18: nas brtsams nas srod kyi bar du bsgrub par bya'o
K12D0502_H0470:366b-19: // grub par gyur na bar gyi bskal par gnas
K12D0502_H0470:366b-20: shing gser gyi mdog can 'dod pa'i gzugs can du
K12D0502_H0470:366b-21: // 'gyur ro // ba bla la ji lta ba bzhin du gi wang dang /
K12D0502_H0470:366b-22: ldong ros la sogs pa la yang brtson 'grus dang ldan pas snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:366b-23: bud med kyi mtshan ma gzhan du gyur pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:366b-24: sngon gyi rten gzhan du gyur pa gzhon nu dang /
K12D0502_H0470:367a-2: sngags gang yang rung ba bzung la ri gseb tu zhugs te 'bum bzlas la /
K12D0502_H0470:367a-3: de nas gzhon nu ma legs par khrus byas te rgyan gyis brgyan par byas te sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0502_H0470:367a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbul bar bya zhing tshogs bsags pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:367a-5: byang chub kyi sems yongs su gzung ba byas la snga ma bzhin du mchod rten dang /
K12D0502_H0470:367a-8: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du ji ltar nus pas mchod pa byas la /
K12D0502_H0470:367a-13: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam lag pa la bcings nas sam /
K12D0502_H0470:367a-14: rdzas de dag las gang yang rung ba nyid dam /
K12D0502_H0470:367a-15: med par yang gzhon nu dkyil 'khor du bcug cing shing mngar po la me spar la /
K12D0502_H0470:367a-17: tshva phye dang bcas pa'i rang gi khrag gis bsgos
K12D0502_H0470:367a-18: pa nyi ma nub nas brtsams nas 'bar bar gyur
K12D0502_H0470:367a-19: gyi bar du de lag pa nas bzung nas bsgrubs
K12D0502_H0470:367a-20: na / de dang bcas par thogs pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:367a-21: dur khrod du lcags kyi rdo rje lag tu bzung
K12D0502_H0470:367a-22: nas slong mo la spyod cing ji srid bdag nyid
K12D0502_H0470:367a-23: gnod sbyin du 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas na bdag
K12D0502_H0470:367a-24: nyid lcang lo can du zhugs par mthong bar 'gyur
K12D0502_H0470:367b-0: ro // der 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i rigs @367b su rang gi gnas thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:367b-1: byon nas sdig pa chen po byas pa yang lag
K12D0502_H0470:367b-2: pa nas bzung nas nges par lcang lo can du
K12D0502_H0470:367b-4: nyal ba'i tshe rdo rje de bsrung ba byas la sngas su gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:367b-5: zas za ba'i tshe yang de lag tu bzung nas bza' bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:367b-6: tsandan dmar po las byas pa'i rdo rje lag tu
K12D0502_H0470:367b-7: thogs nas rtag tu bsod snyoms la spyod pas ri
K12D0502_H0470:367b-8: la 'dzegs nas bzlas pa byas na zla ba lnga'i
K12D0502_H0470:367b-9: nang du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi
K12D0502_H0470:367b-10: nang du skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du gnas
K12D0502_H0470:367b-12: ri la slong mo spyod cing ral gri ma bor
K12D0502_H0470:367b-13: bar rtag tu bzlas pa byas la zas za na
K12D0502_H0470:367b-14: bzung nas bzla'o // nyal ba na yang srung ba
K12D0502_H0470:367b-15: byas te shubs su bcug ste sngas su bzhag na
K12D0502_H0470:367b-16: zla ba gsum gyi nang du rig pa 'dzin par
K12D0502_H0470:367b-17: bzung nas bzla'o // 'gyur ro // 'khor lo la yang cho ga 'di nyid yin no //
K12D0502_H0470:367b-19: sa las lcags kyu byas la dur khrod du me
K12D0502_H0470:367b-20: tog sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la dkyil
K12D0502_H0470:367b-21: 'khor gyi dbus su dur khrod kyi shing las me
K12D0502_H0470:367b-22: sbar la lag pa g-yas par lcags kyu thogs nas
K12D0502_H0470:367b-23: ske tshe'i sbyin sreg bya ste /
K12D0502_H0470:367b-24: dur khrod na gnyug mar gnas pa rnams 'ong gi bar du bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:367b-25: 'ongs nas bdag gis bgyi bci mchis /
K12D0502_H0470:367b-26: bka' stsol cig ces zer na /
K12D0502_H0470:367b-27: de bzhin gyis shig ces brjod do //
K12D0502_H0470:368a-0: de nas bzung nas dran pa tsam gyis @368a *//
K12D0502_H0470:368a-2: de bzhin du shing chen po'i rtsa bar de bzung
K12D0502_H0470:368a-3: nas slong mo spyod bzhin du bzlas pa byas na
K12D0502_H0470:368a-4: gnod sbyin 'ongs nas ci zhig bgyi zhes smra zhing
K12D0502_H0470:368a-5: gang don du gnyer ba'i don de sgrub par byed
K12D0502_H0470:368a-6: do // mya ngan med kyi shing gi rtsa bar
K12D0502_H0470:368a-7: slong mo spyod pas lcags kyu de nyid bzung nas
K12D0502_H0470:368a-8: bzlas na gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas ji ltar mngon
K12D0502_H0470:368a-9: par 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar gnas par 'gyur
K12D0502_H0470:368a-10: do // ro // ri la 'dzegs nas lcags kyu
K12D0502_H0470:368a-11: de bzung nas bzlas pa byed cing rig pa 'dzin
K12D0502_H0470:368a-12: pa grub par byed pa rdzas gang 'dod pas de
K12D0502_H0470:368a-13: bzhin du byas na de dag gi rig pa 'dzin
K12D0502_H0470:368a-14: do // ro // par 'gyur ro // lcags kyu de dang /
K12D0502_H0470:368a-15: klu'i gnas kyi steng du bzlas pa byas na /
K12D0502_H0470:368a-16: de'i rjes la klu steng du langs nas gang smras pa de byed do //
K12D0502_H0470:368a-17: lcags kyu la ji lta ba de bzhin du lcags las byas pa'i ral gri dang /
K12D0502_H0470:368a-19: rdo rje sbyor bas kyang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:368a-20: don yod pa 'dis 'dir nim pa las byas pa'i
K12D0502_H0470:368a-21: rdo rje lag tu thogs nas paksha'i shing gi rtsa
K12D0502_H0470:368a-22: bar slong mo spyod cing bzlas na /
K12D0502_H0470:368a-23: lha rnams 'ongs nas yid la gang 'dod pa'i don
K12D0502_H0470:368a-24: rjes su sgrub par byed cing zla ba gcig gi
K12D0502_H0470:368a-26: thams cad 'ongs bar ma gyur par de bzhin du sbyin sreg bya ste /
K12D0502_H0470:368b-0: gong ma'i yam shing gis me sbar @368b la mar
K12D0502_H0470:368b-1: dang ske tshe sbyin sreg byas na nges par rim
K12D0502_H0470:368b-2: gyis zin par brnyes shing brdungs la changs bur bcangs
K12D0502_H0470:368b-4: thams cad kyi thun mong gi sbyin sreg yin no //
K12D0502_H0470:368b-5: 'dir sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'di yin te /
K12D0502_H0470:368b-6: rdzas kyi ched du ni shing chen dang /
K12D0502_H0470:368b-8: aa mra la sogs pas so //
K12D0502_H0470:368b-9: de bzhin du 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i tsher ma
K12D0502_H0470:368b-10: can gyi shing gi yam shing gis kyang sbyin sreg
K12D0502_H0470:368b-13: s'a lu'i zan gyi chang bu 'am /
K12D0502_H0470:368b-18: mar la sogs pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:368b-19: byang chub kyi shing drung du mchod rten dang /
K12D0502_H0470:368b-21: sku gzugs kyi mdun du dbang du bya ba'i sbyin
K12D0502_H0470:368b-22: sreg gi cho ga ni pri yang ku'i sreg rdzas
K12D0502_H0470:368b-24: me tog dri zhim po'i shing la sogs pa'i yam shing gis kyang der sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:368b-25: aa ti mukta'i bsreg rdzas ni zho la bstegs pas so //
K12D0502_H0470:368b-26: pri yang ku'i bsreg rdzas ni zho dang /
K12D0502_H0470:368b-33: khrag gi chang bus kyang bya ste /
K12D0502_H0470:368b-34: gal te dbang du ma gyur na de dag gis sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:368b-36: til bsres pa'i sbyin sreg gis ni dga' ba chen por byed pa'o //
K12D0502_H0470:369a-1: ba'i mar dang sbags pa'i bo so cha'i tsher mas
K12D0502_H0470:369a-2: ni sha za la sogs pa gdug pa can rnams
K12D0502_H0470:369a-4: ske tshes ni gnod sbyin dgug pa la 'o //
K12D0502_H0470:369a-5: 'bras bu bsregs pas kyang rung ngo //
K12D0502_H0470:369a-6: skyed mos tshal la sogs pa gnas dben zhing nyams
K12D0502_H0470:369a-7: dga' bar me tog gi bsreg rdzas kyis te 'on
K12D0502_H0470:369a-8: kyang klung gi rgyun la dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:369a-9: de la don 'dod pas ni chu klung gi nang du 'dug la autpa la dang /
K12D0502_H0470:369a-15: tsam pa ka la sogs pa'i me tog gsum nas
K12D0502_H0470:369a-16: brtsams nas ci tsam 'byor pa klung gi chu'i nang
K12D0502_H0470:369a-17: du 'dug nas nyi ma gsum yan chad ji tsam
K12D0502_H0470:369a-18: 'dod par rang gi 'byor ba dang mthun par ram
K12D0502_H0470:369a-19: / brtson 'grus dang rjes su mthun par 'bras bu don yod par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:369a-23: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam la sogs pa 'am /
K12D0502_H0470:369a-24: gzhan yang rung rdzas kyi don du me tog la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:369a-25: dbang du bya ba'i phyir ni ma da yan ti ka dra dza ti dang /
K12D0502_H0470:369a-27: pri yang ku la sogs pa'i chu'i nang du 'dug
K12D0502_H0470:369a-28: nas brgya yan chad nyi ma lda yan chad bya
K12D0502_H0470:369a-30: de bzhin du mchod rten dang /
K12D0502_H0470:369b-1: glegs bam yang rung phul na rgyal po la sogs pa des par dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:369b-2: nad kyi don du bya ba'i sbyin sreg ni /
K12D0502_H0470:369b-4: sman gyi shing gi yam shing dang; skyu rur la sogs pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:369b-6: nim pa la sogs pa bla gab med pa'i gnas
K12D0502_H0470:369b-7: su mchod rten la sogs pa la chu'i me tog
K12D0502_H0470:369b-9: dgon pa'i me tog dbul bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:369b-10: de bzhin du mchod rten la sogs pa la nyin bdun yan chad ji tsam nus pa byas na /
K12D0502_H0470:369b-11: nges par nad med pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:369b-12: dbang du bya ba dang bcas pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:369b-13: gdon la ni til mar dang /
K12D0502_H0470:369b-14: rang skyur la bstegs pa'i rgyal po'i yungs kar sbyin sreg gis so //
K12D0502_H0470:369b-17: srin po la sogs pa la thal ba la sogs pas bris pas 'bros par 'gyur zhing /
K12D0502_H0470:369b-21: bdag bsrung ba la ni lan gsum brjod pas so //
K12D0502_H0470:369b-22: gzhan bsrung ba la ni lan lnga byas pas 'dug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:369b-23: gang dag la mdud pa bcings pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:369b-29: yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyis kyang 'chi bar byed do //
K12D0502_H0470:369b-32: 'dod pas kyang dbang du byed cing 'gugs so //
K12D0502_H0470:370a-2: mdor na yid la bsams nas bzlas pa byas na thams cad don yod par byed do //
K12D0502_H0470:370a-3: rang bzhin du gnas pa la 'bebs par byed na /
K12D0502_H0470:370a-5: aa ga ru'i bdug spos la sogs pas dkyil 'khor me tog sil ma bkram pa byas pa la'o //
K12D0502_H0470:370a-6: gdon gyis zin pa la 'bebs par byed na /
K12D0502_H0470:370a-8: mar gyi bdug spos kyis so //
K12D0502_H0470:370a-9: bdug spos thams cad kyang mar dang bcas par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:370a-10: dpal pistha ka la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:370a-11: mar dang bcas pas nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa'i rims zhi bar byed do //
K12D0502_H0470:370a-12: til mar dang bsres pa'i kun du ru ka la sogs pa'i bdug spos thams cad kyis so //
K12D0502_H0470:370a-13: lcags las byas pa'i phur bus gdug pa can srin po dang /
K12D0502_H0470:370a-14: lha ma yin la sogs pa phur bus 'debs so //
K12D0502_H0470:370a-15: gnod sbyin la ni 'o ma can gyi phur bus so //
K12D0502_H0470:370a-16: klu la ni ni ma pa'i shing las byas pas so //
K12D0502_H0470:370a-17: rig pa 'dzin pa la ni shri khanda las byas pas so //
K12D0502_H0470:370a-18: lha la tsandan dmar po las byas pa'i phur bus sam /
K12D0502_H0470:370a-19: ji ltar 'dod pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi
K12D0502_H0470:370a-20: bar du bzlas la gzugs brnyan gyi gnas gang yin
K12D0502_H0470:370a-22: btab nas khros pas gnas de nyid du mtshan ma
K12D0502_H0470:370a-23: cung zhig byung bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa
K12D0502_H0470:370b-0: bya zhing / sred pa med pa'i @370b drag tu khros pas pha rol kun phur bus gdab bo //
K12D0502_H0470:370b-1: bstan pa la sdang ba'i sems can dang /
K12D0502_H0470:370b-2: sems can rnams la sdang ba yang phur bus gdab bo //
K12D0502_H0470:370b-3: dpal phur bus rgyal po gdug pa can gyi dpung phur bus gdab par 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:370b-4: rgyal po phur bus gdab pa la ni tsam pa'i
K12D0502_H0470:370b-5: shing las byas pas rgyal po phur bus gdab par
K12D0502_H0470:370b-6: 'gyur ro // mi'i rus pa'i phur bus ni bgegs phur bus gdab bo //
K12D0502_H0470:370b-7: rus pa las byas pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:370b-9: seng ldeng las byas pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:370b-10: 'od ma las byas pas gdug pa'i phur bus thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:370b-11: tha na stong par gdab pa ltar byas pas kyang
K12D0502_H0470:370b-12: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyis phur bus btab par 'gyur
K12D0502_H0470:370b-13: ro // bcings pal ni rtsva'i 'dab ma la lan gsum brjod pas kyang /
K12D0502_H0470:370b-14: brgya byin yang 'ching bar byed do //
K12D0502_H0470:370b-16: gal te rab tu sbyar na tshangs pa la sogs
K12D0502_H0470:370b-17: pa rang nyid kyang lag na rdo rje stobs po
K12D0502_H0470:370b-18: ches bcings bar bsams na bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:370b-19: grol bar gyur cig ces bsams na grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:370b-20: de lta na yang 'dir sems la dbang ba yang
K12D0502_H0470:370b-21: 'grub par 'gyur zhing dam tshig la dbang bar yang
K12D0502_H0470:370b-22: 'gyur ro // de la 'dir thogs pa med pa
K12D0502_H0470:370b-23: don yod pa'i 'ching ba'i sbyor ba ni yungs kar
K12D0502_H0470:370b-24: dang 'bras btags pa la tig ta dang /
K12D0502_H0470:371a-5: rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya byas nas dur khrod
K12D0502_H0470:371a-6: du sbyin sreg byas na 'ching ba chen pos bcing
K12D0502_H0470:371a-7: bar 'gyur ro // yang na nim pa'i lo ma dang /
K12D0502_H0470:371a-8: ni pi na lhan cig btags nas sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin du 'ching ngo //
K12D0502_H0470:371a-11: skyu ru ra dang lhan cig btags nas phyag rgya
K12D0502_H0470:371a-12: byas la dur khrod du sbyin sreg byas na 'ching
K12D0502_H0470:371a-13: bar 'gyur ro // mngon spyod ni 'di ltar 'byung ste /
K12D0502_H0470:371a-14: dur khrod kyi shing tig ta dang bcas pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:371a-15: tshva dang bcas pa'i yam shing gis dur khrod dam /
K12D0502_H0470:371a-17: skyed mos tshal rnying pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:371a-18: sa sgren gyi phyogs su khros pas nim pa las rdo rje'i rnam pa lta bur byas la /
K12D0502_H0470:371a-19: de nas rus pa'i phye mar rang gi khrag dang
K12D0502_H0470:371a-20: bsgres pas sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma dgus nges
K12D0502_H0470:371a-22: yang na sha chen po mar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:371a-23: yang na nya'i zhag dang bsgos pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:371a-24: yang na til mar las bstegs ba'i ba lang gi sha sa so //
K12D0502_H0470:371a-25: yang na ke sha li thal ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:371a-26: rta'i khra ga dang ske tshes so //
K12D0502_H0470:371a-27: yang na khva'i sgro la sogs pa til mar la ba stags pa'i sgro thams cad kyis so //
K12D0502_H0470:371b-0: yang na rang gi khrag dang bsres pa'i @371b thal bas so //
K12D0502_H0470:371b-1: yang na aarga'i 'bras bu mang la bstegs pas so //
K12D0502_H0470:371b-4: yang na tshva dang khrag gis so //
K12D0502_H0470:371b-7: yang na ba lang gi sha dang /
K12D0502_H0470:371b-9: khrag gis bsgos pa'i sbyin sreg khro ba dang bcas
K12D0502_H0470:371b-10: pas nyi ma dgus byas pas nges par 'chi bar
K12D0502_H0470:371b-11: 'gyur ro // yang na dur khrod du zangs las byas pa 'am /
K12D0502_H0470:371b-12: lcags las byas pa'i snod til mar gyis bkang nas
K12D0502_H0470:371b-13: bsgos pa la sngar gyi rdzas de dag nyid dang
K12D0502_H0470:371b-17: 'gyur byed las bstegs pa btso bar bya zhing gang
K12D0502_H0470:371b-18: sngar gyi tshos pa rnams bsal la gzhan gtso bar
K12D0502_H0470:371b-19: bya ste / brgya yan chad ji tsam 'dod pa sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:371b-21: thal ba btsos pa khrag dang bsres pas sreg blugs bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:371b-22: shin tu drag po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o //
K12D0502_H0470:371b-23: mar gyi sreg blugs kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:371b-25: skud pa bcings pas kyang ngo //
K12D0502_H0470:371b-26: gdug pa tshar gcad pa'i las 'di dag gis nges par gdug pa can 'ching bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:371b-27: gang yang klu gdug ba can zhi bar bya ba'i
K12D0502_H0470:371b-28: phyir klu'i gnas kyi rtsa bar de ltar byas na
K12D0502_H0470:371b-29: de nyid du zhugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:371b-30: gang lha gdug ba can bstan pa la gnod pa byed pa 'am /
K12D0502_H0470:371b-31: sems can mang po la gnod pa byed pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:372a-2: gang yang gnod sbyin gdug pa can dang /
K12D0502_H0470:372a-3: gang yang srin po gdug pa can nam /
K12D0502_H0470:372a-5: rgyal po'i blon chen po 'am; rgyal po'i skyes bu 'am /
K12D0502_H0470:372a-7: phan pa ma yin pa byed pa de rnams zhi
K12D0502_H0470:372a-8: bar bya ba'i phyir khro bo dang bcas pas mngon
K12D0502_H0470:372a-9: spyod bya zhing / bstan pa la phan par bya ba'i don dang /
K12D0502_H0470:372a-10: sems can mang po'i don mthong na don yod par grub pa 'dis sbyar bar bya ste /
K12D0502_H0470:372a-11: dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du bstan pa'i sngags rnams kyis ni mngon spyod kyi las mi bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:372a-12: don chung du la yang mi bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:372a-13: mi ngas la ni zho dang /
K12D0502_H0470:372a-15: mar la bstegs pa'i sha chen dbang phyug chen po'i
K12D0502_H0470:372a-16: gnas su nim pa'i shing btsos pa'i sbyin sreg bya
K12D0502_H0470:372a-17: ba 'am / de bzhin du bsrung ba'i cho ga
K12D0502_H0470:372a-18: byas nas phur bus gzugs brnyan la gdab cing bdun
K12D0502_H0470:372a-19: du gnas kyi zad bza' ste /
K12D0502_H0470:372a-20: dbang phyug chen po'i g-yas phyogs su steng nas phur bus gdab cing brgya bzlas par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:372a-21: yang na lam gyi bzhi mdor lcags kyi rdo rje
K12D0502_H0470:372a-22: bzang nas bzlas pa byas na mings rab tu zhi
K12D0502_H0470:372a-23: bar 'gyur ro // char mi 'bab pa la ni
K12D0502_H0470:372a-24: klung gi rgyun 'bab pa la me tog gis byas
K12D0502_H0470:372b-0: dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rtog pa chen po'i @372b
K12D0502_H0470:372b-1: rgyal po gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa'i tshul 'di
K12D0502_H0470:372b-2: la ni khrus ma byas kyang skyon yod par mi
K12D0502_H0470:372b-3: 'gyur ro // sha za ba yang dgag pa med do //
K12D0502_H0470:372b-5: la du la sogs pa la spyod kyang skyon med do //
K12D0502_H0470:372b-6: lhag ma yang skyon med do //
K12D0502_H0470:372b-7: 'on kyang gang zhig dad pa dang ldan pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:372b-8: byang chub sems bskyed pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:372b-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la jo bo bzhin du gus pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:372b-11: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ched cher byed pa //
K12D0502_H0470:372b-12: 'du 'dzin spong ba la ba de dag ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:372b-13: 'dir log 'dren nye bar 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:372b-14: 'di la bgegs 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:372b-15: 'di 'bad pa chung dus don yod par 'grub pa'o //
K12D0502_H0470:372b-16: 'di ni las thogs pa med pa'o //
K12D0502_H0470:372b-17: rtog pa 'di ni chags pa med pa'i sems bskyed
K12D0502_H0470:372b-18: pa mngon par bsgrub pas sgrub pa'i thabs kyis 'dir
K12D0502_H0470:372b-20: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du spro bar byed
K12D0502_H0470:372b-21: pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs don yod pa 'di goms par
K12D0502_H0470:372b-22: yang bya'o // sems can ma lus pa thams cad
K12D0502_H0470:372b-23: kyi don gyi dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di
K12D0502_H0470:372b-24: la som nyi med pas sgrub pa'i thabs la sbyar
K12D0502_H0470:372b-25: yang bya'o // bar bya'o // lus dang /
K12D0502_H0470:372b-27: yid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du spro
K12D0502_H0470:372b-28: bar byed pa 'di'i sbyor ba la goms par bya'o
K12D0502_H0470:373a-1: dang; byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rten la gsol ba gdab pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:373a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dgos pa sngags 'dis bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:373a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bka' bzhin bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:373a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thad nas legs so zhes bya ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:373a-8: byin gyis brlab pa so sor thob par bya ba'i phyir sngags bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:373a-9: myur du rten gnas gyur nas bde ba'i bdud rtsi
K12D0502_H0470:373a-10: rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir gang yang chags
K12D0502_H0470:373a-11: pa med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rtog pa'i rgyal
K12D0502_H0470:373a-12: po 'di'i sngags kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:373a-13: 'dir brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsang sngags bzlas sam /
K12D0502_H0470:373a-14: sems can gyi khams rnams kyi don du sngags bzlas na //
K12D0502_H0470:373a-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems rgya chen pos mchod
K12D0502_H0470:373a-17: pa chen po'i sprin sems can gyi khams rnams la
K12D0502_H0470:373a-18: bde ba yang dag par skyed pas mngon par mchod
K12D0502_H0470:373a-20: skad cig skad cig la khyad par du 'gro ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:373a-21: gong nas gong du 'gro ba so sor thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:373a-22: mdor bsdus na sngags bzlas pa byas pas sangs rgyas
K12D0502_H0470:373b-0: 'byung ba @373b rnams kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur
K12D0502_H0470:373b-1: ro // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:373b-2: 'di la gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs nas spyod pa
K12D0502_H0470:373b-3: dad pa can bag yod pas som nyi med par
K12D0502_H0470:373b-4: bya'o // brtson 'grus dang bcas pa'i snying rjes smon
K12D0502_H0470:373b-5: lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pas 'di la gus
K12D0502_H0470:373b-6: par byas nas gtsang spras gsang sngags kyi spyod pa
K12D0502_H0470:373b-7: bya'o // 'di nyid dang / bslab pa 'di nyid
K12D0502_H0470:373b-8: la dmigs pa yongs su ma btang bad dben pa'i
K12D0502_H0470:373b-9: gnas su 'du 'dzi dang bral bar byas la sems
K12D0502_H0470:373b-10: bskyed pa thams cad tshad med pa la goms pas
K12D0502_H0470:373b-11: bya'o // 'di nyid dang / bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dang /
K12D0502_H0470:373b-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu dad pas dmigs par rjes su 'gro ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:373b-13: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi las dang rab tu ldan pa'i lus dang /
K12D0502_H0470:373b-15: yid kyi las thams cad yang dag par rtsom pa ste /
K12D0502_H0470:373b-16: sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa la zhugs pas chos de dag la spyad par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:373b-17: de la 'di dag ni rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
K12D0502_H0470:373b-18: po 'dir bar du gcod par 'gyur ba yin te
K12D0502_H0470:373b-21: mngon par mi sbyor ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:373b-23: phan pa ma yin pa la zhugs pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:373b-25: bdag gi bsod nams dang mi ldan pa dang tshul khrims 'chal pa yin pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-0: dman par gyur pa yin pas @374a *//
K12D0502_H0470:374a-1: 'di 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes zer nas yongs su spong ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-2: kun tu 'tsho ba'i dri ma dang /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-3: mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la bdag gi don dang /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-4: gzhan gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad med pa la sbyor ba'i 'dod pa med pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-5: gsang sngags la brtag pa med pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-6: 'jig rten pa'i sngags kyi bstan bcos la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-7: bdag nyid la nga rgyal byed pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-8: gzhan la mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-9: mngon par mi brtson ba spong bar mi byed /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-10: yo byad mang po nye bar sdud pa dang; lus dang /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-12: de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams rtogs par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:374a-13: 'di la ser sna yang mi bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:374a-14: gzhan dag sngags kyi spyod pa la gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:374a-15: brlab par bya ba yang dag par gzung bar bya ste /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-16: de ltar na bstan pa'i don byas pa yang yin no //
K12D0502_H0470:374a-17: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa yang yin no //
K12D0502_H0470:374a-18: gzhan dag kyang yang dag par 'dzud par 'gyur /
K12D0502_H0470:374a-22: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam pa'i chos bzung bar yang 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:374a-25: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad bzung bas thams cad
K12D0502_H0470:374b-0: du @374b mnyam pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par
K12D0502_H0470:374b-1: 'gyur ro // sdang mig bltas pa tsam gyis ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:374b-2: sbyin sreg gis log 'dren la sogs pa 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:374b-3: ras ris kyi cho ga ni nam mkha'i spyan gyi
K12D0502_H0470:374b-4: gnas su ni rdo rje'i mchog ces bya ba rig
K12D0502_H0470:374b-5: pa'i rgyal mo'i mchog bya ste /
K12D0502_H0470:374b-8: rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje lag na thogs pa'o //
K12D0502_H0470:374b-9: 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin ni bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'o //
K12D0502_H0470:374b-10: ras ris gzhan yang cung zhig sngo ba /
K12D0502_H0470:374b-15: 'gying bag gis ri mo rnams cung zhig bskul skum zhing 'dar ba bri bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:374b-16: 'phags pa rdo rje lcags kyus sngags smras pa /
K12D0502_H0470:374b-17: na ma stree ya dhvi k'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:374b-19: aom badzra dzva la aam gi mya a'a karsha ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0502_H0470:374b-21: thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa 'dis
K12D0502_H0470:374b-22: bde sogs bkug nas yongs su spyod pa yang ston
K12D0502_H0470:374b-23: par byed do // sngar bstan pa'i cho gas rengs par byed do //
K12D0502_H0470:374b-24: rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang mnyam pa med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0502_H0470:374b-25: lha la sogs pa'i rigs 'gugs par byed do //
K12D0502_H0470:374b-28: de nas ras ris kyi cho ga ni bcom ldan
K12D0502_H0470:374b-29: 'das kyi g-yas logs su 'phags pa phyag na rdo
K12D0502_H0470:374b-30: rje lag na rnga yab dang /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-1: logs su ni lha mo dang bcas pa /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-3: rdo rje gzhon nu ma cung zhig sngo bsangs so //
K12D0502_H0470:375a-4: rdo rje 'dzin gyi 'og tu ni sgrub pa po
K12D0502_H0470:375a-5: lha mo la mngon du phyogs pa'o; ;lha mo'i 'og
K12D0502_H0470:375a-6: tu ni gzhon nu ma bri bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:375a-7: ras ris gnyis pa ni gzhon nu ma cung zhig sngo bsangs /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-8: lag na ral gri thogs pa /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-9: 'bar ba'i lus can zhes bya ba rdo rje gzhon nu ma bri bar bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:375a-10: de nas yang 'phags pa rdo rje sdes sngags smras pa /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-11: na ma stree ya dhvi k'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:375a-13: aom soo mya bar badzra ya na ma sv'ah'a /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-14: de bzhin du 'phags pa lag bzang gis sngags smras pa /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-15: na ma stree ya dhvi k'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:375a-17: aom badzra garbha phat bi ri ni sv'ah'a /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-18: 'phags pa mthor 'phags kyis sngags smras pa /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-19: na ma stree ya dhvi k'a n'a /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-22: log 'dren la sogs pa 'ching bar byed do //
K12D0502_H0470:375a-23: 'phags pa rdo rje lcags sgrog gis sngags smras pa /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-24: na ma stree ya dhvi k'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:375a-26: aom aa na la sambha be sv'ah'a /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya'o //
K12D0502_H0470:375a-28: rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-29: na ma stree ya dhvi k'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:375a-31: aom sarba sa autta ma bandha badzra shi kha re /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-32: ka ma l'a ka ma l'a /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-33: ma pa l'a aa dhishtha na badzra badzra shi khi shi khi /
K12D0502_H0470:375a-34: na mo aa ma l'a n'a /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-0: shin tu gnod mdzes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin @375b gyis sngags smras pa /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-1: na ma stree ya dhi k'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:375b-3: dhu ba re dhu ba re /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-4: dzv'a la dzv'a la dzv'a la /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-6: rnam par sel ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-7: na ma stree ya dhvi k'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:375b-9: aom tsa ra ba na tsa ra ba na /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-10: ha ra ha ra bi skambha ya /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-11: s'a ra au s'a ra au /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-13: b'a b'a tva ra tva ra /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-14: kha hi kru ra badzri ni sv'ah'a /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-15: mnyam pa rdo rje zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin gyis sngags smras pa /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-16: na ma stree ya dhvi k'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:375b-18: k'a ru na k'a ru na /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-22: sa tv'am bi dha autta ma /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-24: 'phags pa rdo rje zug rdus sngags smras pa /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-25: na ma stree ya dhvi k'a nam/
K12D0502_H0470:375b-27: aom kro dha dzva la au ta ha si ni sv'ah'a /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-28: mtha' yas rdo rjes sngags smras pa /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-30: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:375b-31: aom aasm'a ga ga ne sv'ah'a /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-32: aom aa nam la sa mbh'antu ta ri ni /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-33: na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi sa tv'a n'am/
K12D0502_H0470:375b-34: aa sa mantu gu na autta madhehi bi ram/
K12D0502_H0470:375b-35: ga ga na aa nant'a ga ti /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-37: sa ma ta sa ma ta /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-38: bhi b'i ta hri d'a ye /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-39: sha lha l'a ba le be /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-40: spha ra he spha ra he /
K12D0502_H0470:375b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o //
